title: China, Brexit, Rate Cuts and Bonds: What to Know and How to Play It All
text:
Markets have traded with an aggressive risk-on tone since it appeared that the U.S. and China had reached some kind of agreement (however minor) on terms of tradeThe S&P 500 is up 3.5% since October 8 and the 10-year Treasury yield has risen by 24 basis pointsThe market has also backed way off expectations for Fed rate cutsOn October 8, there was ...
